alerts.name: Absence of Anti-CSRF Tokens
alerts.desc: No Anti-CSRF tokens were found in a HTML submission form.
alerts.solution: Phase: Architecture and Design Use a vetted library or framework that does not allow this weakness to occur or provides constructs that make this weakness easier to avoid.
alerts.otherinfo: No known Anti-CSRF token [anticsrf, CSRFToken, __RequestVerificationToken, csrfmiddlewaretoken, authenticity_token, OWASP_CSRFTOKEN, anoncsrf, csrf_token, _token, _csrf, csrf-token, xsrf-token] was found in the following HTML form: [Form 1: "file" ].

alerts.name: X-Content-Type-Options Header Missing
alerts.desc: The Anti-MIME-Sniffing header X-Content-Type-Options was not set to 'nosniff'.
alerts.solution: Ensure that the application/web server sets the Content-Type header appropriately, and that it sets the X-Content-Type-Options header to 'nosniff' for all web pages.
